publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4119 Bruce Crawford on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion—That the Parliament agrees the following revision to the programme of business for Thursday 14 May 2009— (a) after 9.15 am Parliamentary Bureau Motions insert followed by Ministerial Statement: Community Courts and (b) after 2.55 pm Scottish Government Debate: Scotland’s Engagement in the United States of America and Canada insert followed by Stage 3 Debate: Flood Risk Management (Scotland) Bill
